news.title: Raekwon and Mobb Deep Announce North American Tour
news.summary: A co-headlining tour to celebrate 30 years of Only Built 4 Cuban Linx... and The Infamous

news.title: FearDorian and osquinn Announce New Album, Share New Song “Bags”: Listen
news.summary: The experimental artists’ collaborative Before You Press Play is out in October

news.title: Sorry Announce Tour and New Album, Share Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: The British band returns in November with Cosplay

news.title: Militarie Gun Announce New Album God Save the Gun, Share New Video: Watch
news.summary: The Los Angeles punk band heads out on tour soon in support of its follow-up to Life Under the Gun

news.title: Watch Tyler, the Creator’s Racy New “Sugar on My Tongue” Video
news.summary: A self-directed, orally fixated video for the Don’t Tap the Glass track

news.title: Hannah Frances Announces Tour Dates and New Album, Shares Video for New Song “Surviving You”: Watch
news.summary: Nestled in Tangles, which includes collaborations with Grizzly Bear’s Daniel Rossen, is out in the autumn

news.title: Avalon Emerson Reworks Moby for New Song “E After Next”: Listen
news.summary: Emerson’s live-favorite version of Moby’s “Next Is the E” is part of her Perpetual Emotion Machine singles series

news.title: Cindy Lee Announces Tour
news.summary: The Diamond Jubilee star returns to the road for their first shows in more than a year

news.title: New Movie Depeche Mode: M Coming to Theaters
news.summary: Fernando Frias directed the film, which uses footage from the band’s Memento Mori concerts to explore Mexican culture’s relationship with death

news.title: Madlib and Your Old Droog Tap Killer Mike for New Song “The Edge”: Watch the Video
news.summary: The new track will appear on a forthcoming project from Madlib and Your Old Droog’s Droogie Otis
